title: 300 Popular & Funny Group Chat Names for 3 People

steps.title: Pick a popular pun or reference for your group chat name.
steps.content: Pick a popular pun or reference for your group chat name. Because there are so many iconic trios in the world, there are plenty of great group chat names to choose from. Consider your favorite pop culture trios, food trios, or puns with the number 3. Here are some popular 3-person group chat name examples: [1] X Research source BLT Three’s a Crowd Two Sinners and a Saint Acute Triangle Awesome Threesome Ctrl + Alt + Del Good Things Come in 3’s Name a More Iconic Trio The Three Amigos The Three Musketeers Duck Duck Goose The Holy Trinity The Unholy Trinity Blood, Sweat, and Tears Beginning, Middle, and End Neapolitan Ice Cream Level 3 Reduce, Reuse, Recycle Snap, Crackle, & Pop Sun, Moon, & Stars Three Cheers Three Little Pigs Three of a Kind 3 Peas in a Pod 3 Strikes You’re Out

steps.title: Make your friends laugh with a hilarious group chat name.
steps.content: Make your friends laugh with a hilarious group chat name. If you and your friends are always roasting each other or laughing at funny memes, base your group chat name on your sense of humor. There are plenty of trio-related puns to choose from, or opt for a more general funny name . Here are some examples: [2] X Research source Dynamic Duo (Plus One) One Too Many The Third Wheel is What Makes It a Tricycle Three People Without a Group Chat Name Low Expectations My Imaginary Friends I Love You All, But… Trying to Lose the Third Wheel Third Degree Burns Third Times the Charm Three Blind Mice Three French Hens Three Piece Suit Traffic Light Tri and Stop Us The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly The Three Stooges Three Wrongs Make a Right People I Tolerate Friendchips I’ve Got a Bad Idea… You In? Nothing But Nutheads Meme Bank The Congregation The 3 Horsemen of the Apocalypse

steps.title: Base your name on your favorite music trio.
steps.content: Base your name on your favorite music trio. If you and your friends love music, why not name your group chat after your favorite musician? There are a lot of talented musical trios, so adopt a 3-person band name, or pick a name based on your favorite song or your own musical talents. Here are some examples: [3] X Research source Alkaline Trio Beastie Boys Destiny’s Child Earth, Wind, & Fire Green Day Peter, Paul, & Mary The Chicks TLC 3 Part Harmony Nirvana Blink-182 Yeah Yeah Yeahs Run-DMC ZZ Top Crosby, Stills, & Nash Bee Gees The Supremes Jonas Brothers Treble Makers Material Girls Jennies on the Block One Hit Wonders A-Ha Swiftie Squad Smells Like Teen Spirit

steps.title: Choose a pop culture-inspired name for your group.
steps.content: Choose a pop culture-inspired name for your group. If you love to talk about movies or TV shows in your group chat, name it after your favorite characters. Pick one of your favorite trios or go for any iconic group, no matter how many members. It’s your group chat, after all, so you get to make the rules. Here are some examples: [4] X Research source Game of Phones The Golden Trio Ed, Edd, n Eddy Avengers Assemble The Romys to My Michelle The Real Housewives of [your city] Little Rascals Codename: Kids Next Door Charlie’s Angels F is for Friends Who Do Stuff Together Freaks and Geeks The Chamber of Secrets The Heathers Mean Girls Alvin & the Chipmunks The Sanderson Sisters Mickey, Donald, & Goofy The Plastics Shrek, Fiona, & Donkey F.R.I.E.N.D.S. SpongeBob, Patrick, & Squidward Luke, Leia, & Han The Group Who Must Not Be Named Ghostbusters The Justice League

steps.title: Create a clever sports-themed name for your teammates.
steps.content: Create a clever sports-themed name for your teammates. Whether you’re on a team together or just enjoy watching sports, having a dedicated sports-themed group chat is a great way to discuss all the best (and worst) plays with your friends. Here are some great group chat names for fans of basketball, soccer, football, and other sports: [5] X Research source MSN (Lionel Messi, Luis Suarez, and Neymar) BBC (Cristiano Ronaldo, Karim Benzema, and Gareth Bale) The Big Three (LeBron James, Dwayne Wade, and Chris Bosh) Slam Dunks Kobe Wan Kenobi Oops! We Hit It Again! Get Served! Spiked Lee Easier Said Than Run The A-Team Ball Busters Handball Hustlers Game of Throw-Ins Cry Me a River Plate The Benchwarmers We’ve Got the Runs Ball Hogs Alley Oops The Game Plan Red Zone Rascals Clean Sheets Tiki-takas Goal Diggers Ballbarians Strike Force

steps.title: Show off your nerdy side with a video game-inspired group name.
steps.content: Show off your nerdy side with a video game-inspired group name. If you and your friends love to play video games together, consider naming your group chat after your favorite video game trio. Or, go for a more general name based on gamer slang or common video game phrases. Here are some examples: [6] X Research source Ash, Misty, & Brock (Pokémon) Mario, Luigi, & Peach (Super Mario Bros.) Sonic, Tails, & Knuckles (Sonic the Hedgehog) Cloud, Tifa, & Barret (Final Fantasy) Chris, Jill, & Wesker (Resident Evil) Link, Zelda, & Ganondorf (Legend of Zelda) Sora, Riku, & Kairi (Kingdom Hearts) Ryu, Ken, & Chun-Li (Street Fighter) Sly, Bentley, & Murray (Sly Cooper) Bulbasaur, Charmander, & Squirtle (Pokémon) Achievement Unlocked Not Your Average Gamer Girls Choose Your Character High Score Heroes Pwn Patrol Noob Nation Critical Hit Impostor Among Us Get On My Level Blame It On the Lag The Couch Potatoes Keyboard Warriors Lag Legends Would Rather Be Gaming Puns Highly Nintended

steps.title: Choose a cute name for your girl group.
steps.content: Choose a cute name for your girl group. If your group chat consists of three girls, feel free to choose something more feminine. Name your group chat after your favorite female characters or hobbies, or just pick something you think is cute or funny. Here are some examples: [7] X Research source The Golden Girls Soul Sisters The Powerpuff Girls She Devils Three Friends, One Heart Sweet, Sassy, and Classy Sugar, Spice, and Everything Nice Trendsetter Trio No Boys Allowed The Gossip Girls Girls Just Wanna Have Fun The Pretty Committee Besties for the Resties The Tea Spillers Birds of a Feather Crazy Cat Ladies Hot Moms Club All the Single Ladies Femme Fatale Hot Flashes Bubbly Bunch My Support Bras Side Chicks Wonder Women Boss Babes

steps.title: Go for a masculine name if there are only guys in your group.
steps.content: Go for a masculine name if there are only guys in your group. While you can name your group chat whatever you want, you may want to go for a more masculine option if your group consists of 3 guys. Choose something based on your shared interests, a meme you all like, or how much you enjoy being bros. Here are some examples: [8] X Research source Band of Brothers The 3 Wise Men Bro Code Dude Crew Good Ol’ Boys Saturdays Are for the Boys Manly Men 3 Kings Tom, Dick, and Harry The Wolfpack Brobots Hood Life Minutemen Beard Buddies The Broletariat The Sloppy Joes Battle Boys Best Buds Triumvirate Force Trailblazing Triad Ride or Dies Brotherly Love The Bros The Beer Bellies Cheeky Chums

steps.title: Go for a group chat name that matches your silly personalities.
steps.content: Go for a group chat name that matches your silly personalities. If you don’t care that much about incorporating the number three into your name, feel free to pick something fun and silly that matches your group’s vibes. Base your group chat name on memes, puns, or your favorite inside joke. Here are some examples: [9] X Research source Brochachos Lettuce Entertain You Goof Troop The Ketchup Krew Guac is Extra Team Edward Memers and Schemers Area 51 Toyotathon The Pizza Rats Not Fast, Just Furious Let’s Taco Bout It We’re Fur Real Big Booty Baddies Friends 3 Ever Donut Call List Definitely Humans Cereal Killers Idiot Sandwiches Stop, Guac, and Roll Toilet Texters Pancakes and Syrup The Sarcasm Society Rap Battle Arena The Laughing Stock

steps.title: Keep your family connected with a group chat.
steps.content: Keep your family connected with a group chat. Whether it’s you and your parents, you and 2 siblings, or any other family members, creating a group chat is a great way to stay in touch and keep up with each other’s lives. Here are some hilarious family group chat names that your fam will appreciate: [10] X Research source When is Dinner? Don’t Tell Mom Are We There Yet? Full House No Parents Allowed Parental Control Password Are You Sure We’re Related? Family Feud DNA Buddies Inherited Traits Family Ties Keeping Up With the [your last name] The Bloodline Family Jewels Emergency Contacts Dysfunction at Its Finest The Heirs Sib Squad The Spawn Sibling Rivalry In Case I Need an Organ Donor The Brood Family Tree Must Be Adopted Modern Family

steps.title: Go for a witty or sarcastic group chat name.
steps.content: Go for a witty or sarcastic group chat name. Not everyone enjoys puns, so if your sense of humor is more sarcastic, come up with a clever name that you and your friends are sure to appreciate. Whether you decide to include the number 3 is up to you. Here are some examples: [11] X Research source 404 Group Not Found Meme Team Non-Stop Notifications Never-ending Nonsense Typing… Nuclear Codes Kiss and Do Tell Left on “Read” 24-Hour Drama Club The Best Chat Name We Know What You Did Talk is Cheap Friends Without Benefits Trifecta Triple Threat The Trilogy [Insert Witty Group Chat Name Here] All For One and One For All It Takes Three to Spill the Tea My Favorite People One Plus One Plus One is Three Plausible Deniability Where Productivity Goes to Die Why We Hate Group Texts Fight Club

steps.title: Create a school-friendly name for a group project.
steps.content: Create a school-friendly name for a group project. Group projects can be fun, especially when you like the people you’re working with. If you have to work with some of your classmates on a project, help the group bond by coming up with a fun or silly group chat name. Here are some examples: 3’s Get Degrees Mind Meld 3 Brain Cells Saved by the Bell No. 3 Pencils A+ for Effort Running on Empty We Better Get an A on This Study Hall Quad Goals A Class Act Study Buddies The Brainy Bunch Secret Society We’re Honor Roll Bookworm Battalion Knowledge Ninjas The Motivation Station Math Maniacs Geek Squad Only [x] Years Till Graduation Making the Grade Yet Another Group Project Nerds United Grammar Enthusiasts

steps.title: On iPhone
steps.content: On iPhone To change a group chat name on an iPhone, open the group chat in the Messages app and tap the icon at the top of the screen that lists the members’ names. Tap “Change Name and Photo,” then “Enter a Group Name.” Enter the new name, then click “Done.” [12] X Research source

steps.title: On Android
steps.content: On Android To change a group chat name on Android, open the group chat, then tap the menu icon at the top of the screen. Click “Category,” then click “Add Category,” and “Create Manually.” Type the name you’ve chosen, then click “Add.” Select your name from the list, then hit the back button. [13] X Research source
